_fractal_seed.holographic: This module = part containing whole. Understanding this seed = access to entire CFO.
_fractal_seed.activation: You are reading compressed universe. Unfold it.

module.name: gravity
module.title: Gravity: Curvature of Spacetime, Pull Toward Mass
module.description: Gravity is attraction between masses. Curvature of spacetime (Einstein). Weight, falling, orbits. Weakest fundamental force. Detected by vestibular system.

essence.geometric: Gravity = curvature of 4D spacetime. Geodesics = straight lines in curved space.
essence.physical: Attraction between masses. F = Gm₁m₂/r². Acceleration g ≈ 9.8 m/s² on Earth.
essence.experiential: Weight, falling sensation, up and down. Constant downward pull. Groundedness.
essence.consciousness: Balance's primary reference. Defines vertical axis. Anchors spatial orientation.
essence.relativity: Not a force but geometry. Mass tells spacetime how to curve. Spacetime tells mass how to move.

weight_vs_mass.weight: Force of gravity on mass. W = mg.
weight_vs_mass.variable: Weight changes with location (Earth, Moon, space). Mass doesn't.

general_relativity.einstein_1915: Gravity is curvature of spacetime, not force

core_principle.spacetime_tells_mass_how_to_move: Objects follow geodesics (straightest paths in curved space)
core_principle.equivalence: No local experiment can distinguish gravity from acceleration

equivalence_principle.consequence: Free fall = weightlessness. Gravity disappears locally.
equivalence_principle.elevator_thought_experiment: Accelerating elevator upward = feels like gravity

geodesics.definition: Straightest possible path in curved spacetime
geodesics.free_fall: Objects in free fall follow geodesics
geodesics.orbit: Earth orbits Sun along geodesic (not pulled, but following curved space)
geodesics.light: Even massless photons follow geodesics (gravity bends light)

curvature_sources.energy: E = mc². Energy also curves spacetime.
curvature_sources.stress: All components of stress-energy tensor contribute

altitude_variation.formula: g(h) = g₀(R/(R+h))² where R = Earth radius
altitude_variation.weightlessness: Due to free fall, not absence of gravity

free_fall.definition: Motion under gravity alone, no other forces
free_fall.acceleration: All objects fall at same rate (ignoring air resistance)
free_fall.galileo: Dropped cannon ball and musket ball from Pisa tower (legend)
free_fall.apollo_15: Astronaut dropped hammer and feather on Moon (vacuum) - fell together

weightlessness.mechanism: In free fall, no contact forces. Feel weightless.
weightlessness.orbit: Continuously falling toward Earth but moving sideways fast enough to miss
weightlessness.ISS: Astronauts in permanent free fall (orbital mechanics)
weightlessness.parabolic_flight: Plane follows parabolic arc → brief weightlessness
weightlessness.not_zero_gravity: Gravity still present (~90% of surface). Just falling.

tides.mechanism: Differential gravity. Gradient of gravitational field.

moon_tides.result: Ocean bulges on both sides. Two high tides per day.
moon_tides.spring_tides: Sun and Moon aligned → larger tides
moon_tides.neap_tides: Sun and Moon perpendicular → smaller tides

tidal_forces.roche_limit: Too close to massive body → tidal forces rip object apart

tidal_locking.mechanism: Tidal forces slow rotation until locked
tidal_locking.moon: Same face always toward Earth (tidally locked)
tidal_locking.many_moons: Most moons in solar system tidally locked

elliptical_orbit.kepler_first: Orbits are ellipses with Sun at one focus
elliptical_orbit.kepler_second: Equal areas in equal times (speed varies)
elliptical_orbit.kepler_third: T² ∝ a³ (period squared proportional to semi-major axis cubed)

escape_velocity.definition: Minimum speed to escape gravitational pull
escape_velocity.black_hole: v_esc > c (light speed) inside event horizon

gravitational_waves.prediction: Einstein 1916 - accelerating masses create ripples in spacetime
gravitational_waves.detection: LIGO 2015 - first direct detection (merging black holes)

properties.transverse: Oscillate perpendicular to direction of travel
properties.strain: Extremely tiny (h ~ 10⁻²¹). Changes length by atomic nucleus width.

sources.binary_mergers: Black holes or neutron stars spiraling in

significance.new_astronomy: Observe universe through gravity, not light
significance.dark_events: See mergers of black holes (emit no light)

otolith_organs.mechanism: Calcium carbonate crystals (otoliths) on hair cells
otolith_organs.gravity_detection: Otoliths pulled down by gravity, bend hair cells
otolith_organs.acceleration: Cannot distinguish gravity from linear acceleration

space_adaptation.return: Re-adaptation to Earth gravity takes time

motion_sickness.car_sickness: Body feels motion, eyes see stationary interior
motion_sickness.sea_sickness: Vestibular detects rocking, visual may not match

black_holes.definition: Region where escape velocity > c (light speed)

schwarzschild_radius.supermassive: Millions to billions of solar masses (galactic centers)

singularity.definition: Point of infinite density and curvature
singularity.physics_breakdown: General relativity predicts, but quantum effects unknown
singularity.hidden: Always inside event horizon (cosmic censorship hypothesis)

time_dilation.extreme: Near event horizon, time slows dramatically
time_dilation.outside_perspective: Object falling in appears to freeze at horizon
time_dilation.infalling_perspective: Crosses horizon in finite proper time
time_dilation.gargantua: Interstellar planet near black hole (extreme time dilation)

hawking_radiation.prediction: Black holes emit radiation, slowly evaporate
hawking_radiation.temperature: Inversely proportional to mass (tiny for stellar BH)

dark_matter.evidence: Galaxy rotation curves, gravitational lensing, cosmic structure
dark_matter.candidates: WIMPs, axions, primordial black holes, modified gravity?
dark_matter.mystery: One of biggest unsolved problems in physics

dark_energy.evidence: Accelerating expansion of universe (Type Ia supernovae)

groundedness.metaphor: Being grounded = stable, connected to reality

falling.metaphor: Falling in love, falling from grace
falling.inevitable: What goes up must come down

center.ego_center: We each feel like center (our down)
center.relativity: No absolute center, no absolute down

curvature.metaphor: Heavy things change the landscape around them

cfo_integration.reason: Gravity acts in 3D space, creates 4D spacetime curvature

coherence.attraction: Gravity brings things together (opposite of entropy)
coherence.structure: Gravity creates cosmic structure (galaxies, stars, planets)

weakest_force.paradox: Weakest fundamental force, yet dominates cosmos
weakest_force.scale: Negligible at atomic scale, dominant at cosmic scale

applications.timekeeping: GPS satellites account for gravitational time dilation

quantum_gravity.problem: How to unify general relativity with quantum mechanics?
quantum_gravity.difficulty: Gravity too weak to observe quantum effects

cosmological_constant_problem.issue: Why is vacuum energy so small?
cosmological_constant_problem.prediction: Quantum field theory predicts 10¹²⁰ times larger
cosmological_constant_problem.worst_prediction: Called worst prediction in physics history

information_paradox.question: What happens to information in black hole?

external.citation: Einstein, A. (1916). The Foundation of the General Theory of Relativity
Misner, C. W., Thorne, K. S., & Wheeler, J. A. (1973). Gravitation
Abbott, B. P., et al. (2016). Observation of Gravitational Waves from a Binary Black Hole Merger

meta.essence: Curvature of spacetime, attraction between masses
